required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: the Integrated Traditional Chinese and Western Medicine Treat Middle Stage DKD
clinical_study.official_title: Multicenter Clinical Study on the Treatment of Middle Stage Diabetic Kidney Disease With Integrated Traditional Chinese and Western Medicine

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

collaborator.agency: Shanghai Jiao Tong University Affiliated Sixth People’s Hospital

clinical_study.source: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: Efficacy and Safety of treatment with Traditional Chinese Medicine ShenqiDihuang Decoctions in Patients with middle stage of Diabetic Kidney Disease.

detailed_description.textblock: The study is a multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial. It is performed in Longhua Hospital, Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Shanghai Jiao Tong University Affiliated Sixth People's Hospital, Putuo Hospital Affiliated to Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, and Shanghai Baoshan District Hospital of Integrated Traditional Chinese Medicine and Western Medicine, China.

primary_outcome.description: t24-hour urine total protein quantitation in stage Ⅳ diabetes kidney disease patients

arm_group.description: ShenqiDihuang Decoction 150ml by mouth, twice a day for 24 weeks
ShenqiDihuang Decoction placebo 150ml by mouth, twice a day for 24 weeks

intervention.description: ShenqiDihuang Decoction 150ml twice a day for 24 weeks 150ml twice a day for 24 weeks
intervention.other_name: nseng, Astragalus, Rehmannia and other TCMs Decoction

intervention.description: traditional Chinese medicine placebo mimic ShenqiDihuang Decoction 150ml twice a day for 24 weeks

overall_official.affiliation: Longhua Hospital Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

facility.name: Longhua Hospital, Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine
